![iRK4908FcqUxVe56Cla5ppvLNQbTv-Vlhct00gGuBwU=](https://app.affine.pro/api/workspaces/qf73AF6vzWphbTJdN7KiX/blobs/iRK4908FcqUxVe56Cla5ppvLNQbTv-Vlhct00gGuBwU=.webp)

There are some important changes coming to the web version of AFFiNE. Make sure you understand the changes to ensure you keep your data safe.



**We always recommend you use the latest [AFFiNE Client](https://affine.pro/download) and activate AFFiNE Cloud.**



### What is happening?

We are upgrading [app.affine.pro](https://app.affine.pro) to use the latest version of AFFiNE. At the time of publishing this article, the [app.affine.pro](https://app.affine.pro) web app uses an old version of AFFiNE Cloud which is no longer supported. We will upgrade this web version and retire the old version - along with the old data. These changes are planned for December 14th - 15th (Singapore Standard Time).



### What do I need to do?



#### If you have ever used [app.affine.pro](https://app.affine.pro)

* Head over to [app.affine.pro](https://app.affine.pro) and backup all your data - local and cloud workspaces
* All local data will be completely lost after the upgrade
* We will keep a temporary copy of AFFiNE Cloud data on [archive.affine.pro](https://archive.affine.pro) (live from next week for a limited period)
#### If you are using [insider.affine.pro](https://insider.affine.pro)

* Your AFFiNE Cloud data will be accessible on the new [app.affine.pro](https://app.affine.pro) version after it is updated
* You will lose access to any local storage data - we advise you to download the [AFFiNE Client](https://affine.pro/download) and activate AFFiNE Cloud
#### If you are using the [AFFiNE Client](https://affine.pro/download)

* There's no action you need to take


### More questions?

If you still have questions or concerns please do email us: [support@toeverything.info](mailto:support@toeverything.info)
